txt.en: 'As it was planned, the Dwarf-king leads his people into certain doom!'
'It's threats to the very end, eh?'
'He shall not find the Ring he seeks, but he will find the Rings that were lost!'
'The Rings that were lost... it's some sort of trap, I think!'
'Aye, the Firehorns have left a trail of dead in their wake....'
'The Firehorns came by this way, I think.'
'The trail of dead descends deeper into the caverns. Let us see where it leads!'
'By Durin's beard, what terrible works! What is this place?'
'[placeholder], I think we have come too late....'
'This was a battle between warriors and would-be scholars... these wicked Men stood no chance against the Firehorns.'
'Dwarf? I am Gimli, son of Glóin -- warrior of Durin's Folk!'
'And if I mean to enter the Mordath, I will!'
'Oh, I don't like the look of this at all....'
'We must find the passage into the Mordath, [placeholder], and we must do it swiftly!'
'This is Barad-dûr, after all! King Váskmun and his Firehorns may be the least of our concerns!'
